text: The House of the Faun (), was built in the 2nd century BC. It was a large private home in Pompeii, Italy. It has many great works of art. It is a fancy aristocratic house from the Roman Republic. The house shows the time period better than most archaeological things in Rome itself. ==Gallery== File:Nile Scene Mosaic.JPG|Mosaic with a Nile Scene Image:Satyrnymph.jpg|Erotic mosaic of a satyr and nymph File:Modern copy of the Dancing Faun (in Pompeii).jpg ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Houses Category:Roman buildings and structures Category:Archaeological sites in Italy Category:Mosaics Category:2nd-century BC buildings and structures
